text:
@realDonaldTrump A month ago, 5-year-old Skylar Herbert complained to her parents that she had a bad headache.

Today, she died from complications due to coronavirus.

“She was the type of girl that would just run up and jump in your arms and hug you," her mother said.

https://t.co/33GtrqegOb
